Title: Functional > New Navigation > Measure & Grow > Growth Items Dashboard > 'View By' filter is not changed to 'Talent Development' even though the user has selected the 'Talent Development' option from the 'View By' dropdown.
Repro Steps: Notes: 1. After selecting a 'Talent Development' option from the 'View By' dropdown, Data has been changed on board but the dropdown value has not changed 2. Once the user selects the 'Talent Development' option from the 'View By' dropdown, and when the user changes the 'View By' filter to 'Team' again then GI data has been not changed 3. Once the user selects the 'Talent Development' option from the 'View By' dropdown, and when user selects the 'Talent Development' option again from the 'View By' dropdown then GI data changes team GIs  Steps: Log in as SA Select any company from the company dashboard Switch to new navigation Click on 'Measure & Grow' tab from the top header navigation bar Click on the 'Growth Items' tab Click on 'View By' dropdown Select 'Talent Development' option Observe    Expected Result: The 'View By' filter should be changed to 'Talent Development' even though the user has selected the 'Talent Development' option from the 'View By' dropdown.  Actual Result: The 'View By' filter is not changed to 'Talent Development' even though the user has selected the 'Talent Development' option from the 'View By' dropdown.  Video Title: NN-GI-ViewByDropDownIssue.mp4

Title: UI > New Navigation > Measure & Grow > Growth Items Dashboard > User can see the category at very first column for 'Talent Development' GIs.
Repro Steps: Note: An extra blank column is displayed at the very first column for 'Team' GIs Steps: Log in as SA Select any company from the company dashboard Switch to new navigation Click on 'Measure & Grow' tab from the top header navigation bar Click on the 'Growth Items' tab Click on 'View By' dropdown Select 'Talent Development' option Observe the very first column    Expected Result: The user should not be able to see the category in the very first column for 'Talent Development' GIs.  Actual Result: The user can see the category in the very first column for 'Talent Development' GIs.  Video Title: NN-GI-ExtracategoryColumnIssue.mp4

Title: Functional > New Navigation > Measure & Grow > Growth Items Dashboard > Left/Right scrolling is not coming when user add all the column on grid.
Repro Steps: Steps:Log in as SA Select any company from the company dashboard Switch to new navigation Click on 'Measure & Grow' tab from the top header navigation bar Click on the 'Growth Items' tab Click on any column filter icon Select 'Column' option Select all columns Observe    Expected Result: Left/Right scrolling should be coming when the user adds all the grid columns.  Actual Result: Left/Right scrolling is not coming when the user adds all the grid columns.  Video Title: NN-GI-ScrollingIssue.mp4

Title: Functional > New Navigation > Measure & Grow > Growth Items Dashboard > Blank page is coming when user switch the company.

Actual Result: A blank page is coming when the user switches the company.  Video Title: NN-GI-SwitchingCompanyIssue.mp4
